Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells based on an yttria-doped zirconia electrolyte were developed.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrodes and interconnectors were made from electronic conductors such as Ca-doped LaMnO3 (cathode), a Ni-cermet (anode) and doped LaCrO3 (interconnect).
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After having optimized the electrical, mechanical and thermo-mechanical properties in the past, the emphasis of this work was orientated towards the interfaces between the electrolyte and the electrodes.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By use of interfaces out of mixed conducting materials with small grain size, the best electrochemical performance was achieved.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For creating the interfaces, a thin interlayer was directly applied on the electrolyte as a first step in the electrode production process.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cells and cell stacks were manufactured by tape casting of the electrolyte, screen printing of the electrodes and joining the cells by glass sealing.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The area specific resistance at 1000 degrees C was about 0.8 Omega cm(2), about one third being caused by ohmic losses and two thirds by polarization.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Lifetimes of about 2 years for single cells and of 0.7 years for ten-cell stacks were achieved.
Titulo: Materials, interfaces and production techniques for planar solid oxide fuel cells
